revision.comment: Omega moved page [[Sagemcom SE567 (Frontier Communications)]] to [[Sagemcom SE567 (Frontier)]]
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Sagemcom |model=SE567 |revision=(Frontier) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/20/2006 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Siemens |manuf_model=Gigaset SE567 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=SN8H650 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TNETD7200 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320DTTI-70G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM639165TS-7G |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=TNETW1350A |wi1_chip2_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip2_model=TNETW3422 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=frontierXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^frontier[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.254.254 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=C8:CD:72,E8:BE:81 |oui_eth=C8:CD:72,E8:BE:81 |default_ch= }} CPU part number is TNETD7200ZDW (before Infineon branding) or PSB7200ZDW (after Infineon branding). While the pictured device has Infineon branded silicon, the device is set to TI branded part numbers.
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/doku.php?id=oldwiki:openwrtdocs:hardware:siemens:se567 Siemens Gigaset SE567 on the OpenWrt wiki]
The default SSID appears to be '''frontier''' followed by the last four hex digits (upper case letters) of the LAN interface MAC address.
The power adapter is a '''DVE''' DV-1280-3 (12VDC, 1A).
==Images== <gallery> File:Sagemcom SE567 angled.jpg|angled shot File:Sagemcom SE567 top.jpg|top File:Sagemcom SE567 bottom and label.jpg|bottom and label File:Sagemcom SE567 power adapter.jpg|power adapter </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]][[Has images::power adapter| ]] <gallery> File:Sagemcom SE567 board top.jpg|board top File:Sagemcom SE567 board bot.jpg|board bottom File:Sagemcom SE567 CPU.jpg|Infineon branded CPU File:Sagemcom SE567 WMAC.jpg|Infineon branded wireless MAC/BB </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
